Question 58 
 
  
 
 
 
[Digital Electronics]
 
 
An ADC has a full scale voltage of 1.4 V, resolution of 200 mV, and produces binary output data.  The 
input signal of the ADC has a bandwidth of 500 MHz, and it samples the data at the Nyquist rate.  The 
parallel data output is converted to a serial bit stream using a parallel-to-serial converter.  The data rate at 
the output of the parallel-to-serial converter is _______ Gbps (rounded off to nearest integer). 
 
3 to 3
